data.title: Epic® Integration is NOW Available with Discrete Data
data.text:
The result is more insights and opportunities to realize the full potential of precision oncology.

Oncology is moving at the speed of light, which means your oncology practice workflows need to as well. Comprehensive genomic profiling from Foundation Medicine is now available as discrete genomic results* added directly into the patient’s records.

This integration allows your oncology practice to:

Reduce data entry time for test ordering by 47%.

Streamline report access and review enhanced molecular patient data in-platform.

Turnkey, No-Cost Integration with Epic

Part of having a fast-paced oncology practice is making sure that the systems used in your practice can be integrated easily. Epic integration is an easy no-cost turnkey integration that will have your practice up and running with simple workflows where clinicians and staff can order tests in Epic and view CGP results directly in the patient record.

It’s an easydecision. Getstarted today!

Fill out the form on the right to talk to an EMR Integration Specialist today about next steps to order, receive results, and view discrete data without leaving your Epic system. Your oncology practice could be saving time, reducing stress, and increasing productivity in just a few weeks. It’s one more way that Foundation Medicine partners with you.

*available upon execution of a Molecular Data Letter Agreement with Foundation Medicine.
